short.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: Tired of being tracked online? Enjoy no-tracking, anonymous and secure browsing with privacia.org
short.bg: Омръзна ли ви да бъдете проследявани онлайн? Насладете се на анонимно и сигурно сърфиране без проследяване с privacia.org
short.cs: Už vás nebaví být sledován online? Užijte si anonymní a bezpečné procházení bez sledování s privacia.org
short.da: Træt af at blive sporet online? Nyd sporingsfri, anonym og sikker browsing med privacia.org
short.de: Sind Sie es leid, online verfolgt zu werden? Genießen Sie verfolgungsfreies, anonymes und sicheres Surfen mit privacia.org
short.el: Κουραστήκατε να σας παρακολουθούν στο διαδίκτυο; Απολαύστε μη-παρακολούθηση, ανώνυμη και ασφαλή περιήγηση με το privacia.org
short.et: Kas olete väsinud võrgus jälgimisest? Nautige jälgimiseta, anonüümset ja turvalist sirvimist saidil privacia.org
short.fi: Oletko kyllästynyt online-seurantaan? Nauti seurantattomasta, nimettömästä ja turvallisesta selaamisesta privacia.org-sivustolla
short.fr: Fatigué d'être suivi en ligne ? Profitez d'une navigation sans suivi, anonyme et sécurisée avec privacia.org
short.hi: ऑनलाइन ट्रैक किए जाने से थक गए हैं? privacia.org के साथ नो-ट्रैकिंग, अनाम और सुरक्षित ब्राउज़िंग का आनंद लें
short.hr: Umorni ste od praćenja na mreži? Uživajte u anonimnom i sigurnom pregledavanju bez praćenja uz privacia.org
short.hu: Belefáradt az online nyomon követésbe? Élvezze a nyomkövetés nélküli, névtelen és biztonságos böngészést a privacia.org webhelyen
short.id: Bosan dilacak secara online? Nikmati penjelajahan tanpa pelacakan, anonim, dan aman dengan privacia.org
short.it: Stanchi di essere rintracciati online? Goditi la navigazione senza tracciamento, anonima e sicura con privacia.org
short.ja: オンラインで追跡するのにうんざりしていませんか？ privacia.orgで追跡なし、匿名で安全なブラウジングをお楽しみください
short.ko: 온라인 추적에 지쳤습니까? privacia.org로 추적 없는 익명의 안전한 브라우징을 즐기세요
short.lt: Pavargote nuo sekimo internete? Mėgaukitės nesekimu, anonimišku ir saugiu naršymu su privacia.org
short.nl: Ben je het zat om online gevolgd te worden? Geniet van anoniem en veilig browsen zonder tracking met privacia.org
short.ro: Te-ai săturat să fii urmărit online? Bucurați-vă de navigare fără urmărire, anonimă și sigură cu privacia.org
short.sk: Už vás nebaví byť sledovaný online? Užite si anonymné a bezpečné prehliadanie bez sledovania s privacia.org
short.sr: Уморни сте од праћења на мрежи? Уживајте у анонимном и безбедном прегледању без праћења уз привациа.орг
short.th: เบื่อกับการถูกติดตามออนไลน์? เพลิดเพลินกับการท่องเว็บแบบไม่มีการติดตาม ไม่ระบุตัวตน และปลอดภัยด้วย privacia.org
short.tr: Çevrimiçi takip edilmekten bıktınız mı? privacia.org ile takip gerektirmeyen, anonim ve güvenli gezinmenin keyfini çıkarın
short.uk: Втомилися від стеження в Інтернеті? Насолоджуйтесь анонімним та безпечним переглядом без відстеження за допомогою privacia.org
short.vi: Mệt mỏi vì bị theo dõi trực tuyến? Tận hưởng duyệt web không theo dõi, ẩn danh và an toàn với privacia.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Best search engine for privacy and security: Privacia search Engine, performance of google search without trackers

Looking for the best private search engines that respect your privacy and don’t track your information?  Privacia.org is the search engine you are looking for!  It offers the following benefits:

- Does NOT save, share, or sell your personal or search engine data
- Delivers Google search results
- Doesn’t drop 3rd party trackers or cookies 
- Ensures unprofiled search results, guaranteeing the same information for everyone in the world
- Protects worldwide users with European and Dutch privacy legislation 
- Is GDPR and CCPA compliant 
-Avoid retargeting ads
-Block price trackers
-Browse anonymously

Best private search engines that won’t track you in 2022

Privacia.org is very popular with privacy enthusiasts and is the 2nd default search engine in the Tor browser. Privacia is based in France and operated by non-profit organization. it's powerful servers pulls information from over 400 other sources. These include Bing, Oath (previously Yahoo), and Wikipedia.

Overall, this is the best private search engine in terms of user experience, especially if you’re interested in local search results.

Privacia.org’s interface is very similar to that of Google and other popular search engines. You can search the entire web, or refine your search to images, videos, news, maps, meanings, or shopping. Filters include adult content and timeframe of results.

An impressive commitment to privacy

This provider never collects any user data, including IP addresses, click behavior, or search history. You don’t have to worry about your information being tracked. The service doesn’t track any of your information, including your search queries. The short version of its privacy policy reads:

"Privacia doesn’t log or share your personal information. We don’t track you. We don’t profile you."

Get more information about Privacia.org the world’s most private search engine:
- Homepage: https://privacia.org/
- Privacy Policy: https://privacia.org/pages/privacy-policy
- About us: https://privacia.org/pages/about-us
-contact us: https://privacia.org/pages/contact-us
